fields.name: Spiraling Tempest (C1)
fields.value: Increases the pulling speed of Gale Blade after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.

fields.name: People's Aegis (C2)
fields.value: When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.

fields.name: When the West Wind Arises (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Dandelion Breeze by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Lands of Dandelion (C4)
fields.value: Within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze, all enemies have their Anemo RES decreased by 40%.

fields.name: Outbursting Gust (C5)
fields.value:
Increase the Level of Gale Blade by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Lion's Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt (C6)
fields.value: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze. Upon leaving the Dandelion Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.

description: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of Mondstadt's Knights of Favonius
title: Jean
